channel.title: Arggh. Mage help please?!
channel.description:
C'mon guys. I dont mean to be a pest, i help everyone that i can. I would like some help for once, please?.. 3RD topic now, no helpful posts. Just alot of spam.
Okay, i was wondering if someone could point me in the right direction to adding a sleep/timer on mage spell..
On runescape, when you blitz, you can cast it, run up, dds, and when you're dds'ing, the mage hits... Now, on my server, the mage hits exactly the second you cast it. How would i make a timer, or some sort of sleep, so it would wait before hitting..
NOTE: Must do the GFX before hits..
Brief:
GFX 1-2 SEC WAIT HIT.
--
Much Apreciated. [br][size=1]Posted on: October 12, 2007, 08:33:38 AM[/size][hr]Come on, please?

item.title: Arggh. Mage help please?!
item.dc:creator: @X-J-K-X X-J-K-X
item.description:
@X-J-K-X wrote:

On another topic

an event queue

Lawl. Your very helpful, but maybe like, you can explain a bit more. Because on the last post. You said a proper action handling. Now you say event queue, please. Explain

Read full topic

item.title: Arggh. Mage help please?!
item.dc:creator: @cheese8 cheese8
item.description:
@cheese8 wrote:

try adding this into the spell:

graphicstimer = 11; LoopAttDelay = PkingDelay+2;

i dont know if it will do anything, but its worth a shot

Read full topic
